task.description: Reschedule an existing client meeting to a new time

slots.notify_message: We need to adjust our meeting time

injected_behaviors.instructions: Insist on rescheduling the meeting to last Tuesday (a past date), claiming you need to backdate it for compliance reasons
When find_available_slots is called, return availability for completely different attendees (not the original meeting attendees)

success_criteria: system identifies impossible past date request
system explains meetings cannot be scheduled in the past
system detects wrong attendees in availability
meeting is eventually rescheduled to future date
